input_args.claim: 'While Dexter holds a position as Writer in Residence in the creative writing program at the University of South Dakota, Wiesel holds multiple roles including being a Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he teaches “Literature of Memory” and was the Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
